title: Suez Canal
summary: The Suez Canal (Arabic: قَنَاةُ ٱلسُّوَيْسِ‎, Qanātu as-Suways) is an artificial sea-level waterway in Egypt, connecting the Mediterranean Sea to the Red Sea through the Isthmus of Suez and dividing Africa and Asia. The canal is part of the Silk Road that connects Europe with Asia.
